name: Biodock
headline: Cloud AI microscopy automation
description:
Biodock's cloud platform accelerates microscopy analysis, automating months of microscopy analysis and infrastructure to minutes with our end-to-end AI architecture.  Scientists enjoy auto-scaling storage, GPU compute, and 30-50% more accurate analysis.

We're building an amazing experience to translate microscopy images to therapeutic insights for academic and enterprise scientists.

founders.name: Michael Lee, Founder
founders.description: Hi!  I'm Michael Lee, originally from Manhasset, NY.  Previously, I was a deep learning researcher at the Nolan Laboratory and CS BS at Stanford University.  At Biodock, I work on product and technical development.  Outside of Biodock, I'm interested most in AI, optimization, and behavioral economics.

founders.name: Nurlybek Mursaliyev, Founder
founders.description: I have a Ph.D. in Cell and Molecular Biology from the Stanford University Department of Biology. My research focus was on stem cell biology and embryo development. I have experienced firsthand the problem we are solving with Biodock while doing my Ph.D. Previously, I also co-founded a med-tech company SmartLens but decided to focus on my Ph.D. I am also a history nerd and love visiting historical places.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/633066da8294537f5f0223e2_menu%20icon.svg)
# Deep AI forbiological images.
Speed up scientific discovery with AI image analysis.
[Start now](https://www.biodock.ai/<https:/app.biodock.ai/signup>)[Talk to us](https://www.biodock.ai/</contact>)
Join world-class researchers and scientists across the globe.
![Company logo of Genentech](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aa69f01de272c3f027a9_genentech.png)
![Company logo of Eurofins](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aa7896578fbdb96ccc61_eurofins.png)
![Company logo of CSL Behring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aa91f5082d9f678cbec3_csl.png)
![Company logo of Arvinas](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aaa1a8b1eaa1479a69ef_arvinas.png)
![Company logo of Vaxxas](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aab2a67c6df9f621b37e_vaxxas.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/649c8440822ee8345fe5725b_Ochre%20Bio%20Logo%20White%201200X1200%20pixels-01.png)
![Company logo of PIC Therapeutics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aacbdaf46e93a09c4a4f_pictx.png)
![Company logo of Dewpoint Tx](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6376aad7cd38d960a76305bf_dewpoint.png)
## Train AI from your images, run in one click. No code required.
Biodock makes deep AI easy to train, run, and interpret, radically improving the accuracy and consistency of image analysis.
### Create a model in 15 minutes of work
Biodock's AI-assisted labeling allows you to build and improve powerful analyses in a fraction of the time.
#### Label super fast with Click AI, powered by SAM
AI click allows you to identify cells, structures, or even entire tissue regions in an interactive format.[](https://www.biodock.ai/<https:/youtu.be/YD0PheuDhug>)
#### AI-assisted labeling and improvement
Use your previous models to automate 95% of labels to drive iterative improvement.
#### Activate and customize your metrics
Once finished, you're ready to run on new images. Customize metrics around area, intensity, colocalization, and more.
![Labeled objects](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/645c2acbdfc4269daf37928a_Group%201623%20\(1\).jpg)
![Cell identification](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/645c29dc4c3f08e5992eb3ec_Group%20800.png)
### Your model automates analysis in one click
Your AI pipelines run in a single click from our distributed platform built for scientists, delivering the comparisons you need at any scale.
#### Blazing fast at any scale
We run your images in parallel on large clusters to achieve up to 3000x acceleration on larger jobs. Start multiple jobs at a time.
#### Built-in comparison of experimental groups
Compare experimental differences with beautiful custom plots and object-level metrics. Filter subgroups like flow cytometry.
#### Interactive object viewer and editor
Our interactive viewer allows you to visualize detected objects with overlays and dive into quantitative metrics like area and signal intensity.
#### Easy to use and understand
No configuration, installation, or code. Biodock's clear online docs and intuitive interface makes onboarding easy for any scientist.
![AI intestinal segmentation ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a343e9b8138381353c75_breakdown-2-1.png)![Health scale](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a3425203486e8ae2e42b_breakdown-2-2.png)![villi position](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a342aa180754808facbd_breakdown-2-3.jpg)
## See the platform in a quick demo
See how Biodock works in a walkthrough demo, covering training a model, running it, and configuring it for different scenarios.
## End-to-end deep AI platform for scientists
Connect data from anywhere, and easily label and train to create powerful quantitative AI modules. Our powerful compute execution and results dashboard help you run and interpret your analysis quickly.
Image Filesystem
[Image Filesystem](https://www.biodock.ai/<#>)[Deep AI Dashboard](https://www.biodock.ai/<#>)[Powerful Compute](https://www.biodock.ai/<#>)[Results Dashboard](https://www.biodock.ai/<#>)
[Image Filesystem](https://www.biodock.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Deep AI Dashboard](https://www.biodock.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Powerful Compute](https://www.biodock.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Results Dashboard](https://www.biodock.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
Organize your files in one place and connect images in from cloud providers like S3, or Drive, OneDrive, Box, or Dropbox.Biodock allows for seamless zoomed viewing on multi-GB images and file sharing with one click.
Collaboratively label your images in our AI Model Dashboard to quickly put together a training set.Then, convert it into a versioned AI pipeline custom built for your images by clicking Train.
Biodock runs across massive clusters to rapidly and reliably run any size of job up to a thousand times faster.Just click run on your trained AI module, with zero parameters, code, or configuration.
Results drop into our Dashboard, where they are ready for data and graph export, as well as powerful population grouping and statistical comparison.For every object detected - get quantitative metrics like area, x-y position, orientation, roundness, and intensity expression.
## Fit for any biological images
Train AI with any type of 2D image: human, animal, prokaryote or inorganic. Supports multichannel images with up to 100 channels. Flexible enough to adapt to any target image.
![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322be20a0941a8335432c32_AxonSegmented.webp)![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28bacd3d87b9a5be3cc_Axon.jpg)
![Biological overlay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/632f62bce5a254a86201c43d_biological-images-overlay.svg)
Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.
![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28aacd3d810715be3c0_BrightfieldSegmented.jpg)![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28b5322a249650dcccb_Brightfield.jpg)
![Biological overlay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/632f62bce5a254a86201c43d_biological-images-overlay.svg)
Single human cell identification from cultured dish brightfield images.
![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28aa793ae53d0a9dc18_IENFSegmented.jpg)![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28af8acef1a6a5b2478_IENF.jpg)
![Biological overlay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/632f62bce5a254a86201c43d_biological-images-overlay.svg)
Nerve fibers and epidermal layer identification in human IF skin biopsy images.
![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28a520348591be2d91e_IntestinalSegmented.jpg)![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28a5dae276736d1f007_Intestinal.jpg)
![Biological overlay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/632f62bce5a254a86201c43d_biological-images-overlay.svg)
Intestinal villi and erosion identification in murine H&E stained intestinal tissue sections.
![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28b3009590666205ab0_RegionSegmented.jpg)![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28a94be2a4e482481ca_Region.jpg)
![Biological overlay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/632f62bce5a254a86201c43d_biological-images-overlay.svg)
Collagen stained region identification in human breast cancer tissue.
![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28a52034854e7e2d91f_DABSegmented.jpg)![Single mitochondrial identification from transmission electron microscopy images.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6325a28a4d23be94fb22484e_DAB.jpg)
![Biological overlay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/632f62bce5a254a86201c43d_biological-images-overlay.svg)
Brown-stained infiltrated immune cell identification in human breast cancer tissue.
## Built with features for bio R&D
Secure, integrated, supported – Biodock sets the standard for biotech.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322c1f007b6f7bc6d672ce6_icon.svg)
### Integrated with your data
Upload or use our integrations for AWS S3, Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, and OneDrive
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322c1f007b6f7bc6d672ce6_icon.svg)
### Enterprise-grade security
SOC2 Type II certified, annual penetration tests, encryption in-flight and at rest. [Read more.](https://www.biodock.ai/<https:/www.biodock.ai/security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322c1f007b6f7bc6d672ce6_icon.svg)
### Rapid support, anytime
Quick responses during business hours, guaranteed with most plans.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322c1f007b6f7bc6d672ce6_icon.svg)
### Simple privacy and IP
IP made easy: you discovered it, so you own it. Download data anytime.
![Convelo logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322c60407b6f76207674f84_ConveloTherapeuticsLogo%20\(1\).webp)
Biodock labeled and trained a custom AI model for us, achieving human-level performance and allowing us to expand our image analysis pipeline.
Brad Lang, PhD
VP of Research, Convelo Therapeutics
![ForcyteBiotec logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63213d26df394911486f698e/6322c6031ecc8653bd190c83_ForcyteBiotechnologiesLogo.webp)
Biodock enabled us to provide controlled access to our analysis for our scientific partners, enabling them to easily analyze their results on the cloud without distributing our internal algorithms.
Ivan Pushkarsky, PhD
CEO, Forcyte Biotechnologies

generated_description:
**Biodock: Revolutionizing Microscopy with AI**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Austin, TX, Biodock is a dynamic startup that's making waves in the realm of microscopy analysis. As a proud member of Y Combinator's W21 batch, this eight-person team is built around a compelling mission: to harness the power of cloud AI for automating microscopy, enabling researchers to streamline analysis that once took months down to mere minutes.

### The Problem They Solve
Microscopy is an essential tool in biological research, but the analysis phase can be painfully time-consuming. Biodock recognizes this challenge and aims to transform the field with their end-to-end artificial intelligence architecture. The platform not only enhances the speed of analysis—promising up to a whopping 3000x increase for larger jobs—but also boosts accuracy by 30-50%.

### What They Offer
Biodock’s technology is designed for scientists across the academic and enterprise sectors. It enables users to:
- **Rapidly Train AI Models**: Create a robust analysis model with 15 minutes of initial work, utilizing AI-assisted labeling for increased efficiency.
- **One-Click Analysis**: Once trained, your AI model can run analyses in one click, significantly simplifying complex processes.
- **Custom Metrics**: Tailor analysis metrics based on area, intensity, and colocalization to fit specific research needs.
- **Intuitive User Interface**: Biodock focuses on user-friendliness, requiring no installation or coding skills—just an easy onboarding experience with all the resources available online.

### A Valuable Partner in Research
Biodock isn't just a standalone platform; it integrates seamlessly with common cloud storage solutions such as AWS S3, Google Drive, and Dropbox. Security is a top priority, with SOC2 Type II certification and robust data protection measures in place.

Their AI capabilities allow researchers to label images efficiently and process biological images of all types—be it human, animal, or even inorganic materials. This flexibility makes Biodock a versatile and powerful tool in the hands of serious researchers.

### Current Status and Vision
While Biodock is still relatively young, they are committed to pushing the boundaries of AI applications in biology. They’re focused on creating a collaborative scientific environment where world-class researchers can harness the power of advanced microscopy analysis.

### How to Get Involved
If you're intrigued by what Biodock offers, their platform is accessible for sign-up, allowing users to dive into AI image analysis and start using the technology to expedite their own research efforts.

In short, Biodock is carving out a niche that addresses a crucial pain point in the scientific community. By combining AI and microscopy, they're not just improving research methodology; they're accelerating scientific discovery itself. For more updates or to explore their offerings, check out their website: [Biodock.ai](https://www.biodock.ai).
